item.title: Curriculum
item.description: Use Case As Contact Center Technology professionals, we understand the importance of call deflection, qualifying the caller, and automation. While the use of bots to enable this functionality has become the norm, there are many use cases that require an advanced approach. Integrated Services Amazon Connect Amazon Lex DynamoDB Lambda Training Online Training: Build a Better Bot PDF of Online Course: Build a Better Bot PDF

item.title: Resources
item.description: Documentation Connect Admin Guide Connect API Reference SDK & Developer Tools Lambda Documentation DynamoDB Documentation Quotas Reference Architectures Relevant Blogs Updating your addresses with Amazon Connect and Amazon Lex Integrating WhatsApp using Amazon Lex and Amazon Connect Using Amazon Connect and Amazon Lex to build a Web Chat
